message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $13,500 feels fair. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is cutting it a bit close to my bottom line.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,750?
I'm still a bit above my budget with $12,750. Can we meet at $12,500?
